attributes.action: donate more money and to make more shelters to help those who are living on the street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The issue of homelessness is growing, and we need it to stop. To many people are out on the streets, and with that extra bit of help could have a secure job and a home. Spending more money on developing shelters, and places for these people to go and recieve help, all around the country will really benefit these people who don't have anything to try and make something of themselves.
